articles.description: CHICAGO, Jan 6 (Reuters) - Following are U.S. trade expectations for the opening of grain and soy complex trading at the Chicago Board of Trade (CBOT) at 8:30 a.m. CST (1430 GMT) on Thursday. articles.title: Falkland Islands war photos to go on show for 40th anniversary
articles.description: Imperial War Museums exhibition will explore long-term legacy of the UK’s 1982 conflict with Argentina
articles.content:
Striking images taken during the Falkland Islands conflict will go on display together for the first time in a new Imperial War Museums (IWM) exhibition which aims to highlight the long-term legacy of war.

articles.title: Extreme Heat Killed Hundreds of Magellanic Penguins on a Single Day in 2019
articles.description: New research details the devastating impact of an extreme weather event on a colony of Magellanic penguins living along Argentina’s east coast.
articles.content:
Extreme Heat Killed Hundreds of Magellanic Penguins on a Single Day in 2019
New research details the devastating impact of an extreme weather event on a colony of Magellanic penguins living along Argentina’s east coast.

articles.title: Argentine econ minister says no deal with IMF yet to reduce deficit
articles.description: Argentina and the International Monetary Fund have so far failed to reach an agreement to refinance the roughly $45 billion it owes the fund due to an impasse over how to reduce the country’s budget deficit, Economy Minister Martín Guzmán said on Wednesday.

articles.title: U.S. wheat futures consolidate; U.S. crop in focus

articles.title: ATP Cup 2022. Poland - Argentina: match result and coverage - tennis
articles.description: The White-Reds already had Georgians and Greeks on the schedule. The stakes with Argentina were therefore high – a group win and a promotion to the semi-finals. Although it was difficult to identify an unambiguous favorite, the Poles did not give their rivals the slightest chance. They won all three games Iga Świątek … read …
